search.title: Bincike
search.subtitle: "...Kuma ka ce: 'Yã Ubangiji! Ka ƙãra mini ilmi'" — Suratul Ɗaha, 20:114
search.disclaimer: Ya kamata a yi nazarin Alƙur'ani da hadisi a ƙarƙashin jagorar malaman ilimi masu cancanta, saboda hukuncin addini sun dogara da mahallin da ya fi fadi fiye da ɓangarori guda ɗaya. Fassarori ba za su iya ɗaukar cikakken ma'anar ainihin Larabci ba kuma bai kamata a dogara da su kaɗai ba.
search.noResults: Ba a sami sakamako ba don "{query}"
search.noResultsHint: Gwada wasu kalmomi ko duba rubutun ka
search.voiceError: Shigar da murya ta kasa. Don Allah sake gwadawa.
search.voiceNoSpeech: Ba a gano magana ba. Don Allah sake gwadawa.
search.graphCoverage: Jadawalin ilimi ya rufe surori 3 na gwaji (rufe wani bangare)

algorithm.normalizationDesc: Kafin kowane bincike, ana daidaita rubutun Larabci:
algorithm.normalizeAlef: Daidaita bambance-bambancen alef: أ إ آ ٱ → ا
algorithm.step2Keyword: Mataki na 2: Binciken Kalmar Muhimma (PostgreSQL FTS + BM25)
algorithm.keywordDesc: Sigina biyu sun haɗu: ts_rank (PostgreSQL Full-Text Search) don daidaita jimla, da BM25 don muhimmancin kalma mai nauyi na IDF.
algorithm.idfParams: N = jimlar takardu, df = takardu masu ɗauke da kalma
algorithm.semanticDesc: Ƙirƙiri embedding na tambaya kuma bincika ma'ajin vector na Qdrant don takardu masu kama.
algorithm.step4Fusion: Mataki na 4: Haɗuwar Maki (Haɗaɗɗen Mai Nauyi)
algorithm.fusionIntro: Ana haɗa maki ta amfani da haɗaɗɗen nauyi inda siginar ma'ana da kalmar muhimma suke daidaitawa don inganta samun bayanai.
algorithm.scenarioBothDesc: Lokacin da takarda ta bayyana a cikin sakamakon bincike guda biyu, ana haɗa maki tare da nauyi wanda ke fifita ma'ana yayin ba da lada ga tabbacin kalmar muhimma.
algorithm.weightedCombinationExplain: Haɗaɗɗen nauyi yana ba da lada ga takardu da aka samu ta hanyoyi biyu. Matsakaicin maki shine 1.1 (0.8 + 0.3) don cikakkun dacewa akan sigina biyu.
algorithm.scenarioSemanticOnlyDesc: Lokacin da binciken ma'ana kaɗai ya sami takarda, ana amfani da makin ma'ana kamar yadda yake (babu hukunci).
algorithm.scenarioKeywordOnlyDesc: Lokacin da binciken kalmar muhimma kaɗai ya sami takarda, ana amfani da haɗaɗɗen makin ts_rank + BM25 azaman madadin.
algorithm.bm25NormalizationDesc: Ana daidaita maki na BM25 (yawanci 8-13) zuwa kewayon 0-1 ta amfani da aikin sigmoid.
algorithm.dynamicWeights: Nauyi Masu Canzawa (dangane da nau'in tambaya)
algorithm.confirmationBoost: Haɓaka Tabbaci (idan a cikin bincike biyu)
algorithm.step5RRF: Mataki na 5: Mai Warware Dauri na RRF
algorithm.rrfDesc: Ana amfani da Reciprocal Rank Fusion azaman mai warware dauri lokacin da maki na haɗuwa suke daidai.
algorithm.step6Reranking: Mataki na 6: Sake Tsarawa na LLM mai Haɗawa
algorithm.rerankingDesc: Ana sake tsara sakamakon daga duk majiyoyi (Littattafai, Alƙur'ani, Hadisi) tare ta amfani da LLM don kwatanta dacewa tsakanin nau'ikan.
algorithm.unifiedReranking: Sake Tsarawa mai Haɗawa Tsakanin Nau'ikan
algorithm.unifiedRerankingDesc: Ana tsara duk nau'ikan sakamako tare da prefix na metadata kuma ana sake tsara su tare, yana ba da damar LLM ya kwatanta dacewa a kan nau'ikan majiya daban-daban:
algorithm.rerankQuranFormat: Sunan sura (Larabci/Turanci), Lambar aya + Rubutun aya
algorithm.rerankStep1: Ɗauki manyan ƴan takara daga kowane nau'in majiya
algorithm.rerankStep2: Tsara tare da mahallin metadata don fahimtar LLM
algorithm.rerankStep3: LLM yana ba da maki ga dacewa ga tambaya, yana sake tsara sakamako
algorithm.tsRankDesc: Yana ƙididdige dacewa ta ƙidayar dacewa, la'akari da kusanci, da daidaitawa ta tsawo.

translations.quranTranslationInfo: Nuna fassara tare da rubutun Larabci a cikin sakamakon binciken Alƙur'ani.
translations.bookTitleDisplayInfo: Nuna sunayen littattafai da aka fassara ko aka rubuta tare da Larabci.
translations.authorTransliterationInfo: Nuna sunayen marubuta da aka rubuta tare da Larabci.
translations.hadithTranslationInfo: Nuna fassarar Turanci tare da rubutun Larabci a cikin sakamakon binciken hadisi. Majiyoyi: sunnah.com, hadithunlocked.com.
translations.sourcesQuran: Alƙur'ani: Fassarori na hukuma daga ayyukan malaman da aka buga.
translations.sourcesHadith: Hadisi: Fassarorin ɗan adam daga shafukan majiya inda ake samu, an ƙara da fassarar AI inda akwai rata.
translations.sourcesBooks: Littattafai: Fassara da AI ta samar.
translations.sourcesDisclaimer: Ana bayar da fassarori azaman taimako ga fahimta kuma ƙila ba za su iya isar da cikakken ma'anar ainihin Larabci ba. Bai kamata a dogara da su kaɗai ba.

similarity.cutoffInfo: Ƙarancin makin kamanci don sakamako. Ƙimar sama ta dawo da kaɗan amma mafi dacewa.
similarity.refineCutoffInfo: Iyakar kamanci don gyara bincike. Ƙimar ƙasa tana jefa ragar faɗi kafin tace LLM.

fuzzy.enableFallbackInfo: Lokacin da aka kunna, yana yin daidaitawa ta tushen rubutu idan binciken ma'ana ya dawo da sakamako kaɗan.

embedding.modelInfo: Samfurin AI don binciken ma'ana. Duka suna da harsuna da yawa. Gemini shine asalin samfurin girgije; Jina v3 shine madadin nauyin buɗe.

reranker.modelInfo: Samfurin AI da aka yi amfani da shi don sake ƙididdige da sake tsara sakamako. Manyan samfura sun fi daidai amma suna da jinkiri.
reranker.regularCandidatesInfo: Sakamakon da aka samo daga binciken ma'ana da kalmar muhimma kafin haɗuwar RRF. Ƙimar sama tana ƙara haɗuwa tsakanin hanyoyin bincike amma tana ƙara jinkiri.
reranker.regularResultsInfo: Adadin sakamako na ƙarshe da aka dawo bayan haɗuwa da tsarawa.

refine.queryExpansionModelInfo: Samfurin AI da aka yi amfani da shi don samar da tambayoyin bincike madadin
refine.originalWeightInfo: Nauyin tambayar ku ta asali a cikin haɗaɗɗen sakamako.
refine.expandedWeightInfo: Nauyin tambayoyin da LLM ya faɗaɗa a cikin haɗaɗɗen sakamako.
refine.perQueryInfo: Sakamakon da aka samo kowace tambaya da aka faɗaɗa.
refine.rerankInfo: Haɗaɗɗen sakamako da aka aika zuwa LLM don tsari na ƙarshe.

display.showTransliterationsInfo: Nuna rubuce-rubucen Latin na sunayen Larabci da sunayen marubuta.
display.showPublicationDatesInfo: Nuna shekarar bugawa lokacin da babu kwanan mutuwar marubuci.
display.dateCalendarInfo: Zaɓi tsarin kalanda don nuna kwanan wata

about.description: OpenIDB wani bukatun buɗe ne da aka sadaurata ga tsarin bayanai da inganta binciken littattafan Musulunci, yana sa su kasansu ta hanyar ajiyar bayanai ta gida. Mun kuma ba da APIs ga masu bunkasa don gina akan.
